resources.string: Place your Passport / ID Card directly on the back of the smartphone, usually at the top.
Passport / ID Card is being read
Put your phone over your Passport / ID Card and don\'t move it
Read in your Passport / ID Card
Read in your Passport / ID Card via NFC interface
Error: NFC is not supported in this device.
Authentication has failed! Please try to scan the document again or introduce the data manually.
Impossible to read the document. Passport doesn\'t support CLA .
